memberdef.name: prvLockQueue
memberdef.initializer: taskENTER_CRITICAL(); \ { \ if( ( pxQueue )->cRxLock == queueUNLOCKED ) \ { \ ( pxQueue )->cRxLock = queueLOCKED_UNMODIFIED; \ } \ if( ( pxQueue )->cTxLock == queueUNLOCKED ) \ { \ ( pxQueue )->cTxLock = queueLOCKED_UNMODIFIED; \ } \ } \ taskEXIT_CRITICAL()
